items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and great quality
items.body: Soft and comfortable. Size is spot on. Read more
items.author: Sheila B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Stylish Night Gowns
items.body: These 100% cotton night gowns are designed to enhance a good night's sleep. Sized correctly, you'll find them non-binding and the perfect length to wear out of bed to breakfast and morning coffee. You'll want to slip into these when you return from work or after your busy day. Great colors snd designs. 100% satisfied with these. Read more
items.author: Glenna Gunderson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit, Decent Price Point, Comfortable, Soft Fabric
items.body: I sent these as a birthday gift to my sister who lives in Wellington, Florida. She really likes these 3 gowns, and stated they are very comfortable. She mentioned the fabric is soft and they are not see-through. She's 5 ft 2" and they hit her slightly below her knees. They fit her perfectly with ample room to sleep in and not get twisted up when she moves around in her sleep. She is a restless sleeper. She also stated she likes the colors and patterns on the fabric. She is a coffee connoisseur and really likes the gown with all the different coffee cups and funny statements throughout the fabric. The only negative is these gowns do NOT have pockets. The quality of the fabric is decent. The price point for 3 gowns is decent. The percentage of cotton is higher than most gowns. These are also nice for lounging around on her day off from the hospital. My sister works hard as a Physician Assistant (PA) and has a very stressful, grueling job. She said she can't wait to spend a day having a "lounging" day, binge watching her favorite programs/movie. Read more
items.author: NLS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right
items.body: Lightweight, soft and comfy! Read more
items.author: Ms. M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleep well.
items.body: I love these nightshirts. They are so comfortable and this is my 3rd order. The only problem is deciding what design to get because they all are cute. Read more
items.author: Kristin Edwards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want more!
items.body: I love these!! I've had them for awhile now and they hold up great. The fabric is soft and washes well. The sizing was correct and they fit well. I would buy these again!! Read more
items.author: Kathleen A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality and softness
items.body: ordered these for an elderly lady - she loves them, good fit, good material Read more
items.author: NONE

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Moon+star+pink, Coffee+fly+purple, Paisley+c Fly+c Purple, Paisley+purple+star, Star+purple+pink, Blue Paisley+purple+c Star, Fly+purple+paisley, Purple+c Coffee+c Pink, Cat+star+moon, Pink+star+coffee, Good Night+coffee+pink, Coffee+c Star+c Good Night. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
